title: Town Slimes
summaries: Town Slimes are a type of town pet. There are 8 different Town Slimes; different from the Town Bunny, Town Cat, and the Town Dog, all kinds of Town Slimes can all exist at the same time, with each Slime having different move-in conditions. As with most other NPCs, the condition only needs to be fulfilled once; the Town Slimes will respawn on their own should they be killed.
Like other NPCs, Town Slimes also require a valid standing point in the house (a <linked>home tile</linked>). They may not be able to share a house with another NPC if the house is too small.
